episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_1001_0:
Aw, man! I really had my eye on those
jelly-filled donuts...

Ho ho! The best things in life take time, sprout!
Yeh’ve got to learn not to be so hasty—
especially at suppertime!

Whoa! Tricia wasn’t kidding, was she!
The Battle Buffet Bash looks amazing!

Check out all of the food stalls! Everything looks
incredible! And so many of the Trainers here
look really strong, too!

We’d better hurry, or we’ll miss out on all the best
dishes! C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Hey, kids! Welcome to Surge’s canteen!
See anything that sparks your interest?
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0301_0:
Do you think Zacian wants to
eat something here?
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0401_0:
I guess so! Or...wait a minute.
*sniff sniff*
I think I can smell something...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0302_0: Is it curious about Lt. Surge?
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0402_1:
He does look pretty strong! But I think...
*sniff sniff*
I think I can smell something...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_1001_1:
Aha! That’s it!
I knew I smelled curry!

*giggle*
Did the scent make you miss our camping trips
back in Galar, Zacian?

I bet it did. The smell of curry took me back there
for a moment myself.

Sharing a meal with my Pokémon under the wide
open sky... Such good times! Food just seems to
taste better when you share it with someone.

We should go camping one of these days
and cook up some curry ourselves,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Eh-hehe... I think my stomach is telling me to do
less smelling and more eating.

I’ve got a yellow curry soup here with your
name on it, kid! The spices’ll blow your mind.
I guarantee it!

Or if you’re up for something REAL spicy, try my
Supercharged Spark Ramen! Each bite’s like a
shock to your system!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_1001_2:
It’s my signature dish! I used to make it for all
my buddies back in the day!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0301_2: Is the yellow curry spicy, too?
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0401_2:
Only one way to find out, trooper! That’s what
makes it fun! I guarantee it’s one of my
best dishes!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_0402_2:
You got good taste, kid! Roger that!
One Spark coming right up!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_1001_2: Hang on a minute! That dish belongs to me!

I guess we shouldn’t be surprised a dish that
looks this good has brought some competition.
But we won’t hand it over that easily!

Of course not! But let’s be honest—the only thing
you’ll be eating today is my fist!

Are you sure about that? You’re not the only one
who packs a punch!

The legends say that Zacian’s sword can cut down
anything in one strike! There’s no way we’re
losing today!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4001_1001_3:
It sounds like you’ll be worthy opponents, then.
Bring it on!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_0: What a brilliant battle! Thank you!

I’d love to go for a round two sometime, once the
buffet event’s over and done with!

Same! I’m not thrilled about losing, but I feel like
I got some great experience from that fight!

If we battle again, I’ll beat you for sure.
Until next time, then! See you around!

*giggle*
Looks like we’ve won ourselves our first dish!

*sniff sniff*
Mmm... The smell of the spices in this ramen is
making me drool.

But the steam coming off of the curry soup smells
just as amazing.

Gah! The suspense is killing me! I want to dig in
right now!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0301_0:
We should look for a spot to
sit and eat.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0401_1:
You’re right. Let’s find somewhere nice where we
can... *sniff sniff*
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0402_1:
It would be nice to be able to sit down and eat.
Maybe we could find a... *sniff sniff*
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_1:
What’s that smell? *sniff sniff*
Smells salty... Like the ocean...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0302_1: It’s the work of a master chef!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_1:
Is that Siebold, the legendary chef?! And is that
the legendary recipe I heard he created specially
for the Trainers here on Pasio?!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_2:
...And voilà! This perfection is ready to be served.
Come and get it while it’s hot, fine guests!

Y-you can’t expect my stomach to be quiet when
it can smell a legendary dish, can you?!

I can’t let something that smells this amazing
pass me by! I’ve got to try it!

Ah, I see you all found your way to the buffet
as well. Are you enjoying yourselves?

Hold on—that’s not the last dish Chef Siebold is
serving today, is it?

I believe it is, actually. Did you have your eye on
the spaghetti as well?
Yeah... And I’m guessing you did, too?

You guessed correctly! The inky black color
reminds me of a Dusk Stone.

What secrets lie hidden within that swirling
black whirlpool of pasta...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_3:
Something tells me that one bite of it will
transport my taste buds to a whole new world
of flavor!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0401_3:
Ah, apologies. I forgot that this is one of those
battle events.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_0402_3:
Ah, apologies. I forgot that this event has
special rules.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4002_1001_3:
Well, then? How about we battle for the right to
taste the spaghetti?

With a Legendary Pokémon of Galar as our
opponent, my partner and I will have no choice
but to crush you with everything we’ve got!

Music to my ears!
Go! Zacian!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_0: So I, the Champion of Hoenn, fall in defeat...

Well done. You and your partner make an
excellent pair!

Thank you! Oh my gosh!
We did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Let’s find a spot to feast on our victory dishes!
No more distractions—I promise!

Come on, Zacian! Let’s... Zacian?
Where’d Zacian go?!

Has it run off again? It’s only been a minute or
two since our battle ended, so Zacian can’t have
gotten far.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1101_0:
After a moment of searching, they caught a whiff
of a peculiar scent wafting through the air...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_0:
Hey! Thanks for stopping by!
Welcome to Mallow’s Super Food Stall!

*sniff sniff*
That’s odd... I’m smelling something sweet, spicy,
and sour all at once. Could it be...
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_1:
Yeah! That’s it! A Lansat Berry!
I’d recognize that scent anywhere!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0301_1: You can tell just by the smell?!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0401_1:
Sure! I used it as a curry ingredient fairly often
when I went camping in Galar.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0302_1: Do you have those in Galar, too?
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0402_1:
Yep! I used them as a curry ingredient fairly often
when I went camping.
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_1:
Zacian must have been attracted by the
nostalgic scent.

This little dish is a new-and-improved take on
Alola’s famous Z-Sets! We’re calling it the
Trial Z-Set Special!

Since Pasio imports ingredients from all over the
world, we used a bit of everything to create a
phenomenal new flavor! Get it while it’s hot!
Don’t be shy! Step on up and have a bite!

This Z-Set is so scrumptious, even Legendary
Pokémon will be blown away by the flavor!
I guarantee it!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_2:
This has to be fate, don’t you think? And we’re
already here, aren’t we? Let’s go ahead and
grab this dish as well!
I’d like to try that dish, too.

I’ve heard rumors that Alola’s famous Z-Sets are
to die for. I’ve been wanting to get my hands on
one for ages...

So when I heard they’d be on the menu at this
Battle Buffet Bash, I dropped everything to come
and get some.

In that case, I think it’s time for another battle!
Whoever wins gets to eat the Z-Set.

Speaking of which, this looks like a ton of food!
Are you sure you can eat all of this yourself?
What? Oh, no need to worry about that.

Sounds like you're hungry all right!
C'mon, then! Let's get this battle going!
All right! My partner Pokémon is...CLANG!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_3:
Now that was a fun battle! Your Steelix is the
toughest, sharpest, strongest one I’ve ever seen!

Th-thank you so much. It makes me really happy
to hear that.
I guess I’ll be heading home now...

This is actually a LOT of food, now that I think
about it. Maybe it would be better to share our
dishes with everyone, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0401_3:
Hehe! Thanks! In that case, let’s round up all the
sync pairs we’ve battled today!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_0402_4:
Brilliant! Hehe! In that case, let’s round up all the
sync pairs we’ve battled today!
episode_event_ch0243_00_yuri/4003_1001_4:
Then after we finish eating, we can get back
out there and battle some more!
After all, the Battle Buffet Bash is just beginning!
